text: A grim currency that fuels his unstoppable ascent.
In the heat of battle, Lord Slaurith and his warriors become an unstoppable storm of carnage, fueled by Khorne's unrelenting rage
Lord Slaurith revels in the art of collecting gruesome trophies from fallen foes
Khorne's infernal blessings have turned Lord Slaurith into an indomitable force, shrugging off blows that would fell lesser mortals
Lord Slaurith's once noble kin, the Knights of the Blazing Sun, now serve Khorne's insatiable lust for battle. His leadership inspires fellow knights as they embrace the dark path to glory.
Lord Slaurith's insatiable appetite for carnage and bloodshed empowers him

When the battle reaches its zenith, Lord Slaurith succumbs to the intoxicating call of the Blood God. In this blood-fueled frenzy, he becomes immune to control but at the cost of his safety, making him a whirlwind of destruction on the battlefield.
Chaos Dragons are anathema to the noble beasts of Caldor. They are now corrupted creatures ridden by malicious Lords.
Chaos Dragons are anathema to the noble beasts of Caldor. They are now corrupted creatures ridden by malicious Lords.
